ratings.comment: This class was very easy and interesting. Everything is done online, and you are graded on the same things every two weeks class set up is very simple and easy to understand highly recommend this class.

I took Natural Hazards and Disasters with Prof. Singer. He was honestly a nice guy, but the course structure was not built to his advantage. He took attendance through TopHat for almost every lecture but only started doing so a couple of weeks into the semester. He is super passionate about the material, just not very interesting, and talks slowly.
